alignment.title: Node Alignment
alignment.leftTooltip: Align all selected nodes to the leftmost edge
alignment.rightTooltip: Align all selected nodes to the rightmost edge
alignment.topTooltip: Align all selected nodes to the topmost edge
alignment.bottomTooltip: Align all selected nodes to the bottommost edge
alignment.selectMultiple: Select multiple nodes to enable alignment
alignment.needTwoNodes: Please select at least 2 nodes to align
